name: Rehgar
title: Shaman of the Earthen Ring
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Chain Heal
abilities.description: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 240 Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 240 Health to them.

abilities.name: Lightning Shield
abilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthbind Totem
abilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

heroics.name: Ancestral Healing
heroics.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1475 Health. Cannot be used on Rehgar.

heroics.name: Bloodlust
heroics.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

original.name: Rehgar
original.title: Shaman of the Earthen Ring
original.description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the lands of Azeroth.
original.shortDescription: A well-rounded Healer that pairs well with Melee allies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Rehgar
baseHeroInfo.title: Shaman of the Earthen Ring
baseHeroInfo.description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the lands of Azeroth.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A well-rounded Healer that pairs well with Melee allies.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

trait.name: Ghost Wolf
trait.description: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

abilities.name: Chain Heal
abilities.description: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 240 Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 240 Health to them.

abilities.name: Lightning Shield
abilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthbind Totem
abilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Ancestral Healing
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1475 Health. Cannot be used on Rehgar.

heroicAbilities.name: Bloodlust
heroicAbilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Totemic Projection
otherAbilities.description: Instantly move Earthbind Totem to a new location.

trait.name: Ghost Wolf
trait.description: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

abilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1475 Health. Cannot be used on Rehgar.

heroicAbilities.name: Bloodlust
heroicAbilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

skins.name: Shaman of the Earthen Ring
skins.description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the lands of Azeroth.

skins.name: Storm Wolf Rehgar
skins.description: Long ago the spirit of Lo'gosh revealed itself to the orc clans of Draenor. To this day his ferocity and feral instincts still serve as a guide to the shaman of the Earthen Ring.

skins.name: Great-father Winter Rehgar
skins.description: Some people believe that Great-father Winter is just a symbol of commercialization created by Smokeywood Pastures. Those people get coal shoved up their stockings.

skins.name: Ironclaw Rehgar
skins.description: The deal was simple... His life in exchange for training Garrosh's warriors. With their victory in Orgrimmar, Rehgar knew the Iron Horde could only be brought down from within.
